lights.name: Lightning
lights.description: A basic Lightning strike, randomly flashes on for a short time
lights.intensityDescription: Controls how bright the flash will be
lights.speedDescription: Controls how often the lightning will strike

lights.name: Simple Flash
lights.intensityDescription: Controls how dim the light will be when it flashes off
lights.speedDescription: Controls how often the light will flash

lights.name: RGB Flash
lights.description: A simple flashing light, cycling between Red, Green and Blue
lights.intensityDescription: Controls how dim the light will be when it flashes off
lights.speedDescription: Controls how often the light will flash

lights.name: Police Flash
lights.description: A simple flashing light, cycling between Red, and Blue, mimicking police lights
lights.intensityDescription: Controls how dim the light will be when it flashes off
lights.speedDescription: Controls how often the light will flash

lights.name: Deep Torch
lights.description: A deeper, alternative version of the torch
